mapper.select: select class_id, class_name, grade, department, teacher_id, status, is_delete, create_time, update_time from class where class_id = #{classId} and is_delete = 0

select c.class_id, c.class_name, c.grade, c.department, c.status, c.create_time, ( select count(1) from student s where s.class_id = c.class_id and (s.is_delete = 0 or s.is_delete is null) ) as student_count from class c where c.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and (c.is_delete = 0 or c.is_delete is null) order by c.create_time desc
